value.title: Snowflake taps C3 AI to bring AI dev tools and apps to customers

value.title: Chinese startup Pony.ai plans to launch a driverless robotaxi service in California in 2022
value.excerpt: Pony.ai, the robotaxi startup that operates in China and the United States, has started testing driverless vehicles on public roads in California ahead of plans to launch a commercial service there in 2022.

value.title: Democrats reintroduce bill to ban government use of facial recognition
value.excerpt: A group of lawmakers in Congress reintroduced the Facial Recognition and Biometric Technology Moratorium Act on Tuesday.

value.title: Enterprise AI budgets are up 55% over 2020, Appen says
value.excerpt: Appen State of AI report found enterprises are accelerating their AI strategies as a result of the pandemic and increasing budgets.

value.title: Understanding The Potential Of Unsupervised AI
value.excerpt: It may have taken a pandemic, changing the very fabric of the workplace, but at last, we’re realizing the promise of unsupervised AI. For the first time, companies are leapfrogging to success by adopting “pure-play” unsupervised AI across the enterprise and leaving behind yesterday’s point solutions.
